definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: west (late) (place of sunset);—[[מִמַּעֲרָבָה]] ( = [[בָהּ]]-, cf. De Ges: § 91 e) Is 45:6 from its setting-place (opp. [[מִמִּזְרַח־שֶׁמֶשׁ]]); [[מַעֲרָב]] opp. [[מִזְרָח]] also Is 43:5, Is 59:19, Ps 103:12, Ps 107:3, so ´[[לַמּ]] westward 1Ch 7:28, 1Ch 12:16 (van d. H. v:15), 1Ch 26:16, 1Ch 26:18; ´[[מ]] opp. [[מוֹחָא]] Ps 75:7; [[מִן־הַּמַּעֲרָב]] (alone) Da 8:5; c. [[ה]] loc. [[מַעֲרָָבָה]] 1Ch 26:30 westward, sq. [[לְ]] = to the west of 2Ch 32:30, 2Ch 33:14, [[לַגִּבְעָה]] ´[[מִמּ]] Ju Jdg 20:33 acc. to LXX (not B) Vulgate Be GFM al. (v. [[[מַעֲרֶה]]]).
